name: FIXNode
short_description:
- Fully administrable FIX connectivity service.
- Connectivity Schedules specified by Cron expressions that enables for international time zones as well.
- Built in FIX Router that handles automatically DeliverToCompID etc with One to many message distribution policy.
- Automated alert emails of connectivity status Socket Errors, Message Rejects, Business MessageRejects and DontKnowTrades.
- Flexible Plugin architecture that works on runtime and changes the business logic layer on the fly on every FIX connection without breaking or resetting any of the connected sockets or FIX sessions. This enables engine to run 24x7 without any restarts.
- Remote management interface that can manipulate any one or all of the connected FIX sessions and even change its computer id’s and ports. It can query logs and export them to excel with FIX tags parsed or undecoded FIX message dumps.
- Microsoft Message Queue and ActiveMQ middleware support.
